statements: SELECT * FROM fake_accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_status FROM fake_accounts WHERE account_id = 123;
SELECT account_name, political_affiliation FROM fake_accounts WHERE account_type = 'bot';
SELECT account_name, propaganda_content FROM fake_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_status FROM fake_accounts WHERE political_affiliation = 'Liberal' AND account_status = 'active';
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM fake_accounts WHERE account_status = 'active' ORDER BY account_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM fake_accounts WHERE propaganda_content LIKE '%conspiracy%'
SELECT * FROM fake_accounts WHERE political_affiliation = 'Libertarian' ORDER BY account_id ASC
SELECT account_id, account_type, propaganda_content FROM fake_accounts WHERE account_status = 'suspended' AND political_affiliation = 'Republican'
SELECT account_id, propaganda_content FROM fake_accounts WHERE propaganda_content IS NOT NULL ORDER BY account_id
SELECT * FROM fake_accounts;
SELECT account_id, username, email FROM fake_accounts WHERE is_fake = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM propaganda_posts WHERE is_propaganda = FALSE;
SELECT post_id, account_id, post_content FROM propaganda_posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT account_id, username, email FROM fake_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'user%' ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM fake_accounts WHERE is_fake = true;
SELECT account_id, username, email FROM fake_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM propaganda_posts WHERE is_propaganda = true ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(post_id) AS num_posts FROM propaganda_posts GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(post_id) > 5;
SELECT p.post_content, a.username FROM propaganda_posts p JOIN fake_accounts a ON p.account_id = a.account_id WHERE a.username LIKE '%bot%' ORDER BY p.created_at;
SELECT * FROM Accounts;
SELECT account_id, username, email FROM Accounts WHERE is_fake = false;
SELECT account_id, email, username FROM Accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, start_date, end_date, outcome FROM Investigations WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Accounts WHERE is_fake = TRUE;
SELECT username, email FROM Accounts WHERE account_id = 123;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE account_id = 456 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investigations WHERE outcome IS NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, investigator_id FROM Investigations WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fake_accounts;
SELECT account_name, is_verified FROM fake_accounts WHERE follower_count > 1000;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE is_promoted = TRUE ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, is_bot FROM fake_accounts WHERE is_verified = FALSE;
SELECT link_url FROM propaganda_links WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01' AND created_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT account_id, account_name, follower_count FROM fake_accounts WHERE is_bot = false ORDER BY follower_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE is_promoted = true AND post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_name, is_verified, follower_count FROM fake_accounts WHERE followers_count >= 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, reason FROM fake_accounts INNER JOIN flagged_accounts ON fake_accounts.account_id = flagged_accounts.account_id WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%' ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM propaganda_links WHERE link_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND created_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM propaganda_accounts;
SELECT account_name, follower_count, creation_date FROM propaganda_accounts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, follower_count FROM propaganda_accounts WHERE follower_count > 1000;
SELECT account_name, creation_date FROM propaganda_accounts WHERE creation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM propaganda_accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT account_name, follower_count FROM propaganda_accounts WHERE follower_count > 1000;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_id, account_name, follower_count FROM propaganda_accounts JOIN posts ON propaganda_accounts.account_id = posts.account_id;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE reason LIKE '%fake news%';
